entry.title: CTV+CSFS: Can we reach consensus on a first step towards covenants?
entry.summary: The communication underscores a concern regarding the premature conclusion of discussions without having quantified the benefits for Liquid. The central issue raised indicates a perception that decisions are being made or discussions concluded without a thorough analysis or presentation of the potential advantages to Liquid. This implies a need for further evaluation and possibly more detailed exploration into how the subject matter could positively impact Liquid, suggesting that a more data-driven or evidence-based approach might be necessary before finalizing any decisions or closing off discussions on the topic at hand.
